notes.title: Climeworks Failed to Capture Enough CO2 to Offset Its Own Emissions, According to Icelandic Investigation.
notes.description: Why did Climeworks fail to meet its CO2 capture targets? What are the endogenous and exogenous challenges facing the company?

notes.title: Large Language Models (LLM) Preferences for Female Candidates Were Consistent Across 70 Professions Tested.
notes.description: How do LLMs show gender preferences in hiring? What are the implications of this behavior for recruitment processes?

notes.title: Congestion Pricing in New York Reduced Travel Times by 48% and Honking Complaints by 70%.
notes.description: What are the effects of congestion pricing on New York traffic? How has pricing impacted urban quality of life?

notes.title: US FDA Approved CRISPR-Edited Pigs, Immune to Porcine Reproductive and Respiratory Syndrome, for Human Consumption.
notes.description: How was CRISPR technology used to modify pigs for human consumption? What are the implications of FDA approval for meat production?

notes.title: Enhanced Rock Weathering Can Remove CO2 for Less Than $100 per Ton at Large Scale.
notes.description: How does enhanced rock weathering work for CO2 removal? What are the requirements to make this technology economically viable?

notes.title: Lessons on AI Agents from Claude Playing Pokemon.
notes.description: What insights into AI agents can be gained from Claude's experience with Pokemon? How can games be used to study AI behavior?

notes.title: New Graduates Are More Likely to Be Unemployed Than the Average American, a Trend Starting in the Early 2010s.
notes.description: What is the unemployment trend among recent graduates in the US? What factors contribute to this situation beyond AI?

notes.description: How do biodiversity credits work in the financial market? What is the potential of this new type of climate finance?

notes.description: How is AI used to generate Fortnite gameplay? What are the implications of this technology for the video game industry?

notes.title: AI System Identified Ripasudil as Potential Treatment for Dry Age-Related Macular Degeneration (AMD).

notes.title: Creatine Supplementation Is a Safe and Potentially Effective Intervention for Some Symptoms of Alzheimer's Disease.
notes.description: How can creatine help treat Alzheimer's symptoms? What are the benefits and risks of creatine supplementation for this condition?

notes.description: How does FaceAge estimate biological age from face photos? What are the benefits of this system for medical prognostication?

notes.title: In 2024, $1 Trillion in Wealth Was Created for the 19 Richest American Households.

notes.title: A 62-Year-Old Man Received a Genetically Modified Pig Kidney, Eliminating the Need for Dialysis.
notes.description: How did genetic modification make pig kidney transplantation possible in a human? What are the implications of this revolution in organ transplants?

notes.description: How much did CATL invest in R&D compared to its competitors? How is China consolidating its leadership in the battery supply chain?

notes.description: How much did Neuralink raise in its latest funding round? What is Neuralink's pre-money valuation after the capital infusion?

notes.title: China's Current Growth Requires 300 GW of Nuclear Power Every 4 Years to Keep Pace.
